pages.title: Kamen Rider Tassel
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Saber: Final Stage (2021, stage show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:saber/devices/haken_bladriver#haken_bladriver_tassel)Haken Bladriver$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Slash$(li)Speed VII$(li)Resistance IV$(li)Haste IV$(li)Jump Boost VIII$(li)Strength VII
